author: Daniel Pragel
comment: This app does exactly what I need. Adding points, subtracting points, and resetting the score are all simple and straightforward.

author: StayingArmed
comment: I will be using this for cornhole so it would be amazing if you had the option to change colors so it's not just red/blue
title: Color Options

author: Christopher Jameson-Groves
comment: Perfect. Nice, simple and clear score keeping.
title: Simple and easy to use
